poem:
Title: "In Echoes"

In DeSantis' echo, a stretch of claim,
American essence drawn, a time-smoke wisp.
Speaks he, the notion, no ill flame,
In nation's breast, where truth might lisp.
"Not racist?" Beckoned by Haley's whisper too,
But heartbeats tell, in rhythm unsteady,
A discourse mired, an ardent stew.
Our nations' tales, the truths we're ready.
